The sides of a triangle are of lengths $13$, $14$, and $15$.  The altitudes of the triangle meet at point $H$.  If $AD$ is the altitude to the side length $14$, what is the ratio $HD:HA$?\\
\\
$\textbf{(A) } 3 : 11\qquad
\textbf{(B) } 5 : 11\qquad
\textbf{(C) } 1 : 2\qquad
\textbf{(D) }2 : 3\qquad
\textbf{(E) }25 : 33$
